name: Gift Card $50
description: The Indexx Gift Card is a versatile digital gift card that can be redeemed within our exchange for cryptocurrency. Upon redemption, you will receive our stable coin, IUSD+, equivalent to the card's value. You can easily trade IUSD+ for any other cryptocurrency available on our platform, making it a flexible and valuable gift for anyone interested in the crypto space.

description: The Indexx Hive Pack offers a curated selection of Indexx and non-Indexx tokens, including popular cryptocurrencies like BTC, ETH, and SOL. It’s the perfect blend of top cryptocurrencies to help someone start their journey in the crypto industry. Buy it from our shop and redeem it on our exchange to instantly receive a diverse pack of tokens. The Hive Pack is the best way to kickstart someone’s experience in the world of digital assets!
